                java.lang.String targetId)
         throws MortuaryServiceException
        Description copied from interface: MortuaryService
        Runs the API with specified parameters, entry point, and permission level.
        Specified by:
        run in interface MortuaryService
        Parameters:
        xcoord - X coordinate of the window.
        ycoord - Y coordinate of the window.
        windowWidth - Width of the window.
        windowLength - Length of the window, otherwise known as the height.
        cssPath - Path to style sheet to use in windows.
        nodeId - ID of node from where the request was made.
        ep - Entry point for the API.
        permissionLevel - Permissions for logged in user.
        targetId - ID of a target request to open.
        Throws:
        MortuaryServiceException
